content.detailedDescription: I check the webcam photos of el volcan de colima (colima, mexico)daily.  today i discovered this triangular shaped ufo hovering beside the volcano.  the other photos are of different sightings on different days.  all photos are dated and time stamped.
content.summary: Simply amazing!

content.detailedDescription: On march 5, 2015 at 4:45am pst, wife and myself where driving into work. as soon as we left the home, wife noticed a strange orange/yellow orb far in the distance. i turned and looked and commented that it may be a helicopter or a star, but to my surprise, the object dropped another object and then it became two orbs hovering. i asked wife to record using the mobile phone. after few seconds, that orb move back towards the primary orb and appeared to have been absorbed making it a single orb again. one that happened, the orb hovered up slightly and went dark for about 30 seconds or so, then it reappeared and glowing brighter.  after few seconds once again, it appeared to drop something that was glowing and appeared to reflect a slight streak of light downwards towards ground. a few seconds after that, the primary orb release a second orb once again, which hovered a little distance away from primary, of which then was quickly absorbed back by primary orb and went dark, loosing sight. we have a video of which unfortunately is not the best and does not serve justice to support what we truly saw.
content.summary: Glowing unknown objects

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the window and i guess the colour of the object caught my eye. when i first saw it i thought it was an airplane. i live under a flight path near yvr so seeing aircraft, at high and low altitudes, is very common. i realised it was unusual when i watched it a little longer. it was moving slower than an airplane, assuming it was a similar size, or it was much larger and farther away. most of the planes i've ever seen have several lights. some are steady beams and some blink. this object was pulsing just one colour, a red-orange. the pulse was slow, and seemed to range from bright to off. it looked low in the sky, like maybe at "traffic helicopter" height. it was probably very visible if people were below it. i couldn't hear it. i looked away when it was close to going behind a building. my pictures are bad, just an example of colour and location.
content.summary: Red-orange light pulsing, moving slowly, straight line, far away, unusual

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en mi pieza, y por tercera vez en esta semana al mirar por la ventana veo una luz blanca fija y una verde que parpadea, eso llamo mi atencion, la primera vez que lo vi pense que era un avion pero a lo largo de la semana volvio a aparecer en el mismo lugar y se mantiene estatico durante unos 20 o 30 minutos y luego se desplaza en direccion sur , pero a baja velocidad, siempre aparece por la noche alrededor de las 12-1am y desparece de mi campo visual a las 3 o 4 a.M .
content.summary: Luz blanca fija verde parapadea

content.detailedDescription: I opened the back slider door and noticed a very large orange object with dark red fibrillating light on the borrow descending approx leeds than one mile away 140 degrees (se). object stopped and hovered for about two- three minutes. i reached for my binoculars and saw a round sphere with dark red lights going crazy at the bottom of sphere. it looked like it dropped (shot) out of sides near. the bottom.The object started to ascend slowly then took off at a very high rate of speed directly south. it looked like it traveled miles in just a couple seconds. it was just after dark. no noise. there is more but i want to post this soon. please let me know if anyone has seen this thing near albany oregon
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Let my dog out noticed a large orange object defending wither the lower portion like fibrillating dark red lights at the bottom. object stopped and hovered like was trying to gain control then object ac ended rapidly a a very high rate of speed travel

content.detailedDescription: This is my 2nd try telling my sighting for my screen went all white couldnt do anything but shut down then restart.Weird.I was in my backyard having some beers by my fire pit.Orbs so close couldnt help but notice them.Neighbors backyard very close.I thought they where ufos.I wasnt scared.I flicked my lighter on over my head and waved them to come over but they kept on moving very slow like 5~10 mph.I got a great look at them.Thesize of a volkswagen bug or a little larger side by side about 1 or 2 pickup truck length apart from each other.This is what i saw! i can only describe them as energy balls!The outside was some sort of an energy field like those glass plasma novelty spheres one could buy yrs ago that when you touched the glass the electricty would follow your finger. but the whole outside of the orbs was like that.Squiggly lines on the whole sphere though.I was really close 100 ft away id say.Not a drone not a ballon.I was energy!
content.summary: Two large orbs silently moving slowly over neighbors housett

content.detailedDescription:
Direction: directly above
was at miami beach taking sunrise , skyline pictures with iphone 1st gen
have been working with video and audio for 15 years.
often take landscape pictures .
felt a presence above and there it was .
invisible triangular craft admitting no noise whatsoever .
you should know as well as i do .
they have superior technology (invisible at will) not yet within our comprehension .
they expose themselves on purpose 
they attempt communication.
and sometimes succeed. 
feel free to contact me .
content.summary: I am a reacuring contact tee  had video of mothership from 2005 during blackout was stolen .Picture of daytime  contact retrievable .

content.detailedDescription: It started back in 2014 i walk to our mailbox to get the mail at night i find walking at night is relaxing to me. so nights when i walk i've noticed lights on the horizon behind our house. as i'm walking towards our house it's still there sometimes 2-3 of them very bright. my mom and wife have both witnessed these events. it's not radio towers or anything i've looked during the day nothing there. but at night when i get the mail there it is or there they are. so on march 1 2015 i saw the biggest object ever it was the size of a football field and bright red. people think i'm crazy because i can't get video or pictures but every time i go to get my phone out of my pocket to take pictures or video it's gone. i suffer from epilepsy and sometimes when i'm witnessing this i feel as i'm about to have a seizure so i have to hurry inside my home.
content.summary: Very scary my mom and wife have them.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed two orbs aligned northeast to southwest from a line drawn north to south. at the same time i observed floating matter in the air falling to the ground, the matter resembled spider silk from japanese spiders that commonly fly on the wind with their webs. but this stuff was different, similar but only 3" max in length, like a seed pod cast in the wind. i noticed those first then looked up an saw the orbs, geostationary with two bright object equally spaced transitioning around the orbs themselves. the orbs themselves through binoculars seemed to have something moving on the surface but they were too distant to determine what it was. these orbs remained in position and were visible still at 8 miles away. i pointed them out to my friends i met for lunch, they were amazed also. estimated distance between is deceiving as distance is unknown, 24cm high on a rule held @ arms length of 71cm. i am not a mathematician, just an observer.
content.summary: Two orbs aligned northeast to southwest with smaller orbs nearby.

content.detailedDescription: We were standing on my friends front stairs. i looked up and under a hundred feet this object was flying over us it was never ending. it flash multiple colors i was not the only one to see it. call the police station they said there was 11 other sightings. traveling east to west no noise no gases nothing it was too long to be anything that i can imagine the man that was with me at the time we were kids doesn't know i'm doing this but if he was questioned he can tell you the same thing
content.summary: It was lik never ending and flshing lights

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i saw a ufo one night it zig zaged across the sky then stopped. the craft then dropped from being star like to being 1000 feet or so. when it dropped it was a split second and the object became 3 different lights. when we saw this we went inside and grabbed guns.  we sat up until 7 am. this was probably 3 am and lasted 45 minutes. three years later my cousin came to my house to grill food and hang out. we had a few drinks on my deck and smoked cigars. we discussed the ufo we saw a couple years before and what it could have been. then something caught my eye, i could see it moving around through the trees. we both got up to take a look and saw the craft emit a light that would be comparable to 2 full moons. there is nothing that we have that could make a light like this. it was unreal, then after about 15 seconds it disappeared. it was as if the speed took the light and it was gone toward space.
content.summary: I saw a light that was unbelievable in size. it would be comparable to 2 full moons. it appeared then 10 seconds after the light it was gone was gone.

content.detailedDescription: it looked like a ball of energy, light and fire that hovered close above the apts where i live. there was not any sound.So after i stood and looked at it , i got into my car and drove away.
content.summary: As i went to my car it looked as a constant ball of an energy, light, fire that hovered not far above from where i was standing no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription: In darkness, around 8:15 pm, husband was having cigarette on back deck of home and looked around house to northeast when he saw structure approaching over neighborhood hill and treetops, and called wife to see.  when he first saw it, husband thought it was chinese lantern. both saw it move in a straight line toward their home. it passed close to overhead, to the nw of them watching from back deck, traveling ne to wsw. it looked like a flaming light in a structure, glowing red-orange-yellow from within, with the light shimmering like heat. it cruised low and silent. it looked like it was 50-100 feet over the treetops. it passed low such that it was behind trees as it approached. husband thought structure was rectangular; wife thought it was pyramid-shaped. it moved at a fairly slow but completely constant speed and direction on windless night. total time witnessed 1-2 minutes. husband and wife were stunned and just watched transfixed, trying to make sense of what they were seeing. they watched it disappear over hill behind their home.
content.summary: Flame-like light in structure on low straight-line path, silent

content.detailedDescription: Less than one month to a prior sighting of a pitch black light absorbing square, i witnessed it again on the opposite side of the sky.  this time while moving it started to leave 4 straight lined vibrant blue lines then completely vanished out of site. it traveled roughly four inches across the sky, while leaving 4 lines one from each edge of a vibrant blue color.  there was no arcing to the trails and they vanished immediately with the vehicle.  having always wondered what i was seeing, after viewing an episode of hangar 1 with bob lazar and further research into the subject.  it would appear that according to his explanation it turned on its warping technology, then engines, turned said engines off then disappeared through it's warp.  definitely an amazing site to see, the psychological aspect, was that i for some reason though of the word sita(spanish for star and further a nickname for a friend i knew, but had not thought of for years.) before i decided to head out for a cigarette.
content.summary: Less than one month to a prior sighting of pitch black light absorbing square, i witnessed it again on the opposite side of the sky.  this time while moving it started to leave 4 straight lined vibrant blue lines then completely vanished out of site.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving home through the country. nothing but empty fields and far off trees to my right. i was on the phone with my boyfriend when i noticed a huge shadow go over my car and move slowly across the field on my right. i said "what the he*# is that shadow?" and looked up and around thinking that must be a huge plane to cast such a large shadow, but i saw nothing in the sky. i started describing what i was seeing to my boyfriend, but i heard no reply. the line had gone dead. the huge shadow was shaped like a parallelogram and moved no more than 5-7 mph in a straight line towards the trees. there was no sound, no wind, nothing in the sky, no buildings nearby and no reason for that shadow to be there. i felt a wave of nausea and almost drove into the field as i was observing the shadow. going off the road scared me back into myself and i felt the overwhelming need to get out of there as quickly as possible. it seemed like forever, though looking at my phone record showed it could have been no more than 2 minutes that i witnessed whatever this was. i sped away calling my boyfriend back as i did to discuss what happened. when i got to the end of the road i saw some dogs running towards where i had just left and they were shaking their heads funny as they ran. my boyfriend recommended that i make this report, though i have to admit i feel really ridiculous and stupid for reporting a big shadow.
content.summary: Clear sky, no clouds, planes, or anything. huge shadow cast by nothing moves over car and field slowly.

content.detailedDescription: Just looked up at what appeared to be two stars one on top of the other. then the object moved and changed colors from white to blue then it started changing shapes. we followed it in the car and took many pictures and several videos. around 8:20pm it just vanished. the siting lasted 35 minutes from 7:45-8:20pm with the moon just peaking the horizon
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Crazy moving lights in the sky that changed shapes as well as changed colors. hovering then moving at incredible speed and making erratic movementsthat shouldn't be possible with the technology and aircraftsthat are commonly know

content.detailedDescription:
My experience has happened numerous times over several years.. latest events have happened every night for the past week or so and have been the most interesting sequence of events.  

started with alien watching me and my husband in darkness.  they were primate-like and non threatening at all.  one was leaning over and watching my husband very closely.  the other was leaning over me.. i spoke to it, and could not hear the reply only saw it's mouth moving....  many sightings of brightly colored glowing webs with creatures and different things..  this night was the first time i saw a creature.  then for the next few nights i saw various bright-colored creatures..   i saw a huge grid on the wall behind the tv ..  it had about 6 inch letters and pictures - but i couldn't figure it out before it disappeared.  same night, again a grid but this time i heard in my husbands voice him calling me to look though he was asleep..  i again saw a grid over his entire chest with letters and amazing drawings of various animals..  again, i could not figure it out before it disappeared... one more time that same night - a grid on the sheets - i tried to straighten it out to see, but again it disappeared..  these events have happened on and off the past week or more..  last night - again there was a huge grid on wall..  this time there were english words and phrases - but one block on the grid was a clock with the hands moving forward quickly..  the clock was the only character on the grid that was both red and flashing.  

the times there were webs with various things on them - it was huge and across the ceiling...  a number of times i could feel the various creatures in the web with my hand.  a few times there were creatures on the covers of the bed.. i could feel the movement on the covers..  two nights ago three insects kept flying around the room..  they landed on the bed and all disappeared at the same time..  when the grid appeared on the wall - i got a flashlight, and they disappeared immediately.  same with turning on the light....  

i have never been scared (except when the web had spiders and i'm afraid of them).  i truly feel they are trying to send a message of some sort.. i just can't decipher it.  when i wake my husband to look - he sees nothing..  i have been awake when these experiences happen, so that convinced me i was not dreaming.  one time a web and etc happened when i was out of the country.. .  i could feel them in my hand and feel them walking on the bed - etc.  but, when i turn on the light, they disappear..  i have tried to take pictures - but have not seen anything on them when i have.  i have tried to look carefully on the grid on the wall with the light of the television, but don't have much time to do so before they disappear..
content.summary: Saw alien, messages, lights, webs, glowing creatures...

content.detailedDescription:
The morning i was leaving for college on august 18, 1977 i was awakened by a flashing light that reflected off my bedroom windows located on the side of the house.  because the colors were exactly like what was on the top of a police car at the time, i figured a policeman must have pulled someone over in front of our neighbor's house, and the lights were just reflecting into my room. i got up to use the bathroom and saw the same flashing red/white lights coming into the bathroom window which was located on the back of the house.  i stood up to peer out the window and was shocked to find something which resembled the flashing lights on police cars at the time (they were taller in 1977 than they are in 2015) on the grass in my neighbor's back yard. inside the flashing light (shaped exactly like the bubble lights on police cars at the time), was a whitish figure.  it had a head, arms and legs, proportioned similar to humans.  no eyes or facial features were observed. it did not hover over the ground but appeared to be on the ground.  it would stay in one place for several minutes and then dart quickly to another place 5-6 feet away and stay there for a few min. and then move again.  as it moved, it left a trail of light, yet it would appear to be in one spot and then instantly be in another a few feet away.  i never saw the arms or legs move.  perhaps it was because my eyes were distracted due to the continual flashing lights (like when a police officer pulls a car over and leaves the lights flashing).  i observed this creature (??) for an hour from the bathroom window.  it continued to move in a zig-zag pattern all over my neighbor's yard until it was at least 100 feet away from me in the north part of their yard. i could still see the lights flashing against my bedroom windows at that point, but could not see anything else.  it did occur to me to go outside and investigate, but since i did not know what it would do to me, i decided to stay in the safety of my home.  i was not scared that it would hurt me inside my home, but was afraid of what it might do if i went outside.  i finally went back to bed, and a couple hours later my family and i left to move me to my college dorm 2.5 hours away from where i lived.

i did mention what i saw to my father but he did not believe me.  because of that i did not tell anyone else until recently.  i doubt this will mean anything to anyone, but i have often wondered what it was that i saw.  i was not sleep walking and i was fully awake.  i am a light sleeper and the flashing lights were what awakened me.  i have never seen anything like it since. i do wonder if anyone else in the world has seen something similar, which is why i'm reporting this.

i sketched what i saw at the time but don't have it on my computer now.  if anyone wants a drawing, i can scan and email it. i have a doctorate degree in music and teach at a university.  that is one reason it has taken me so long to report what i saw.  i wouldn't want to lose my job.
content.summary: Flashing red/white light like on 70s police cars w/white figure inside on ground.

content.detailedDescription:
1. taking trash to curb.
2. looked toward the moon.
3. no doubt - a ufo.
4. saw a bright blue light moving extremely fast.
5. definitely not a plane of a falling star.
6. it simply vanished - cloudless sky - did not reach horizon.
content.summary: Bright light flew overhead extremely fast and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mother in laws smoking outside, and saw this come over the top of her house! it was about 9:30 pm! i was so mesmerised1 i couldn't move!
content.summary: I was out inmy mother in laws smoking

content.detailedDescription:
This is from my youtube page:
 
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

i shot this in the early morning of feb 28, 2015. while smoking a cigarette on my deck i noticed a strange light in the sky. i walked inside to get my canon sx40 powershot hs camera. i started filming this video and i also have others on my laptop. i'm trying to understand what this "thing" was that i filmed. 

sorry for the shaky camera work. the temperature was around 20 degrees. i stayed outside for a good hour and a half watching this "thing" moved around in the sky. if you ask i can also upload the other videos that i shot from this night.

i will say that i have seen several strange things in this area of north carolina. i grew up in this area and have witnessed strange occurrences numerous times. if this is nothing more than a star or planet i will apologize for wasting your time.

i also posted some vlc snapshots on my flickr page for those to see. here is the link:

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: I shot this in the early morning of feb 28, 2015. while smoking a cigarette on my deck i noticed a strange light in the sky. i walked inside to get my canon sx40 powershot hs camera. i started filming this video and i also have others on my laptop.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were at home during the evening hours. my kids and wife were in the house and i stepped outside to have a cigarette. i was casually looking at the stars and i noticed a star like object moving through the night sky. my initial thought was it was maybe a satellite because i have observed one in the past. i quickly noticed that it was something different because it split into three different objects and they all went in different directions. one went north and another went east and the other object went south. they all moved in a straight line leaving no noticeable trail. i called my wife outside to see the objects so maybe she could come up with another explanation of what i was seeing. she also was baffled by the sighting. we proceeded to watch the objects until they were out of sight. due to fear of being ridiculed we kept the sightings to ourselves. i work weird hours and had to work that night. upon my return home the next day my wife called me into the garage to have another cigarette. she was excited to show me a picture she had taken earlier in the day. she was outside watching the thunderbirds practice for the upcoming air show. she noticed another object during the practice session. this object she explained was shiny and flying above the thunderbird aircraft. she happened to have her phone with her and snapped a picture. she said right after the picture was took the object disappeared. she stood outside for a few more minutes looking for the object but it never reappeard. i was not present during this sighting.
content.summary: Two day event with multiple objects

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving north on hwy 95 in melbourne, florida, in november 2014.  we were south of patrick afb/cape kennedy area.  i took two pictures of clouds with my cell phone from the vehicle only because the clouds interested me.  one photo at 9:59am and again at 10:00am.  this was 18 days before the scheduled dec 5 mars test launch at cape kennedy which actually took place dec 6. i did not see the formation on the second photo until i downloaded them to my computer in january. i was intrigued but assumed there is a non-ufo explanation.  a friend urged me to send the photos to you.  i did not observe any activity at the time.
content.summary: Captured in random cloud photo

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving to minneapolis on i-94 when we noticed a light in the southern sky. at first, we thought it was just a planet. as we continued on, however, it started moving more easterly. after 45 minutes of this, we stopped in hudson, wi to film the object at the location provided in the map, and in the video file included. it appeared to be cylindrical, with the upward slope towards the rear of the object relative to its motion. i braced myself against the vehicle and held my hands in close to my body to minimize camera motion. we lost sight of the object after we got back in to the vehicle and continued on to minneapolis. 

given that this object did not appear to behave like any astronomical phenomenon, nor any man-made objects, we felt it important to document it and submit our collected information.

this is one of several videos made at this time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cyllindrical object, upward angled to the rear, moving erratically, lights appear near the object

content.detailedDescription:
On march 2, 2015 at 7:20 pm, i was backing out of my driveway, preparing to drive south to 7/11. when i looked in my rear view mirror, three bright red lights, forming an elongated triangle shape, stood out immediately in the sky.

right away i knew it was something abnormal. the three lights occupied a large portion of the horizon behind me and were brighter/wider than the traffic lights i could see north of me. there's absolutely nothing in the area that could have created those lights, no towers or tall buildings. i parked across the street to photograph it, alongside fresno high school and diagonal from my house.

the three red lights moved in unison giving me the impression it was a single object. it went from west of palm street to east of palm before staying stationary in the sky. the lights moved horizontally. as i proceeded to get my camera out, the three reds lights faded out one by one. first the top most point, then the bottom right point and finally the bottom left point. about 10 seconds after the lights faded out, a small airplane flew across the area in the sky i was looking towards. i realized the red lights were very high in the sky compared to the position of the airplane, which came from ne and flew sw. a single picture was taken as the final red light faded out.

i was excited to see this object because on feb. 24, 2014 i witnessed two v-shaped objects hover over my neighbors house and over me at a very low altitude (which i reported, mufon cms # 54312). those objects had the same big red lights under them as i saw last night, but this formation gave me the impression that it was bigger than the objects i saw last year.

i lost sight of it when the three red lights faded out one by one. i couldn't make out anything between the lights. i stood in the street and looked for 5 minutes, but couldn't see anything. the entire event lasted about 1 minute from beginning to end. my girlfriend was with me the entire time and saw the same lights i did. i used 2 google map images and ms paint to illustrate what i saw and where it moved.
content.summary: 3 bright red lights forming  triangle, moved horizontally before vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
I decided to look at venus as it was very bright. i have a pulsar recon 550 night scope and i am an active observer of the night sky. i live on a farm and have very little light pollution. i opened the window and looked out and noticed an object beside venus. i watched the object for a short while and then got my binoculars. i could not see the object with the binoculars. i rushed and got my recording equipment hooked up to my scope to record the thing. the wind was gusting up to 60mph and heading in a sw direction, directly towards me. i hung out of my window and filmed it for approx 4 mins. it moved slowly from one side of venus to the other. clouds passed at about 4 mins and then the object just vanished. none of this was visible to the naked eye. i did not have my ir illuminator on. some have suggested it is lens flare. i have filmed bright objects like venus, jupiter and the moon and not got lens flare before. i was not shooting through a window. it was open and to the right of me. the actual gap i had to film was only 6 inches, so i was unable to move either side much. it was very windy and the wind was blowing in my face quite a bit.

later when i went to bed, i heard a buzzing sound. i thought it was the wind vibrating off something, but it has never done it before and we are in a very windy location. no one else could hear the buzzing sound. i was still able to hear it even wearing ear plugs. the following day, i felt very weird and fuzzy in the head. i could not think straight and kept forgetting where i'd put things. i also had an overwhelming urge to debunk what i had witnessed the previous night.
content.summary: Cylindrical object moved slowly past venus

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on i-10 east bound around pensacola florida about 2:15 to 2:30 am the saturday before thanksgiving 2012, i was doing 75 mph pulling a trailer with my motorcycle on it, i noticed two 18 wheelers ahead of me about 300 yards in the right lane, when i got about 35 yards from them i started to get in the left lane, all of a sudden a bright light appeared in the left lane with an object about the size of a large car in front of the light, i slammed on my brakes and my tires were sliding, the back end of my truck was starting to slide sideways, i thought to my self that i was going to hit this thing and die, the next thing i know is i was about 100 yards ahead of the trucks parked on the right side median, i waited a minute or two to get my bearings, i got out and checked the front and back of my truck and my bike, absolutely nothing was wrong with anything which i thought was impossible, there was no way that i missed what was in the road, it was right there in front of me, i looked back and saw the two trucks stopped in the road and the left side of the road was still lit up like it was day time, i looked at it for about 3 minutes, there was no smoke,no other cars coming my way nothing was happening so i got a flashlight from my truck and started walking towards the 2 trucks,i walked about 25 yards then stopped, i got this feeling that i should not go over there so i went back to my truck and watched for about another 2-3 minutes and still no movement no sound nothing so i got back in my truck and left. still to this day i know that there is no way that i could have missed what was in the road, i believe that something saved my life that night, what it was i will never know.
content.summary: One minute i was about to hit it with my car, next thing i was on right median stopped car in park

content.detailedDescription: It was about 3 am on 06/25/2014. it was hot in my house and i was unable to sleep, so without turning on any lights, i got up and went to open my front door to get some air. when i opened the door i observed a glowing object floating around the bushes next to my porch. it was smaller than a basketball, about the size of a melon. it was not a solid glow but seemed to glow more in some places than others with a bluish-white light. it moved around the bushes similar to the way a butterfly would move, as if it was checking out the bushes. i was dumbfounded. when it got to where i couldn't see it from inside, i stepped out on the porch and watched it go several feet further along the bushes, then it flew up into the tree near my porch. after it flew up into the tree i couldn't see it any more. i went back into my house and went to the window to see if i could spot it in the tree. as i leaned forward to look up in the tree, i noticed a craft of some kind sitting in the sky between and above my house and the tree. it immediately moved slowly so it was positioned behind the tree where i could no longer see it. it had at least 2 white lights on the bottom. it made no noise. it's basic shape was saucer shaped but the dome on top was more angular shaped than rounded. i went back out on the porch to see if i could see it. it had just started raining. i couldn't see it from the porch and was a little hesitant to go out in the yard to try to spot it. i then went back inside and to my back porch but could no longer see it. i just want to know, whether it is from this planet or some other, what it was doing in my yard at 3 am.
content.summary: Observed a glowing orb floating around porch, then a saucer shaped craft in sky above house

content.detailedDescription:
On 30 november 1968 at approximately 02:00 hrs local in titusville, brevard county, florida while traveling north on interstate 95 i and another individual in the vehicle witnessed at ufo hovering beneath a high voltage power line to the west of the highway (coordinate 28.494738n  80.833144w).

we stopped to watch the ufo, which was 250 feet away(distance verified on google earth).  the ufo was approximately 20 feet in length and 8 feet high, very dark flat gray, no windows, no sound, shaped like a football with the nose cut off and had slightly concave sides.  there were 3 red light on the front(top and bottom corners)and a large bright white light on the rear point.  if viewed from the bottom the ufo would probably have appeared as an elongated triangle with curved sides.

after observing the ufo for what may have been a minute i was suddenly aware that that we were again moving and some distance from where we had stopped.  did we lose time, were we abducted,  i'm not sure i want to know!

interestingly this event took place three week before the launch of apollo 8 on 21 december at the nearby kennedy space center .
content.summary: Ufo hovered benaeth high voltage power line, close encounter of the first kind

content.detailedDescription: After dinner 1/14/15 at 6:22 pm, i went outside with my camera to take photos of the sun.  looking south at the sun, at around 20 degree elevation i took the photo.  when i looked at the photo image i noticed what looked like objects that appeared to resemble morse code centered across the face of the sun.  i did not see them at the time the photo was taken as the sun was very bright.
content.summary: Standing on the driveway pavement taking photos of the sun
